titles.title: To suspend temporarily the duty on Pyridine,4-[[4-(1-methylethyl)-2-[(phenylmethoxy)methyl]-1H- midazol-1-yl] methyl]- ethanedioate (1:2).

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Ways and Means.

bill.summary: 4/16/2002--Introduced. Amends the Harmonized Tariff Schedule of the United States to suspend, through December 31, 2005, the duty on a specified chemical.
